name: Ogacho.GitHub.io
body:
### About Me.
Hi, I'm Ogacho! This is my Designer and Developer Protfolio. I'm currently a novice designer/developer but working to be a pro soon. I like rugby, cars and all things tech.
If you'd like to follow me on twitter, my handle is @iamogacho 

### General Information
I'm not currently available for any design or development work, but open for any hackathons and similar engagements!
Twitter and email are the best way to reach me.

### Contact
* okutao@gmail.com 
* @iamogacho
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
